TEXT.S: hawngu' Utux yalaw gi nanak hawngu Utux qaniy nanak qu tuqiy awsa' kya 'tuxan ru. hawngu' Utux sun Tayal hya' ga mutuw ktan sa kayal na bun wagi' sa gnagap cikay lngut kayal ka blaq balay ktan na hawngu', yalaw gi ini' baqiy tmring na qba' ru, nanu' yasa qu sun naha' maha hawngu' na Utux kya la.
